task.summary: Default task
Starting to give shape as an Erasmus Test app.
Made the Steps list change colors depending on Status.
Lots of changes, into making many small parts of this app work.
Xml Input for Processes now works in its most basic form.
Refactored the way the XML Input classes do their work.
Working toward a good step list to step details and map workflow.
Specific Step's screen works ok - and made the visuals a bit more acceptable even for a prototype.
Working on lots of small iterative changes.
Made Delayed notifications work.
Working on the addition of an Intro Slider in the first use of the app.
Last commit before migrating ListView to RecyclerView.
Changed the Intro screens to Activities that handle Fragments.
Mostly played with the the app theme, and did some improvised "refactoring" to the xml files.
Refactored the source files into more specific sub-packages, and created some more toy user data input screens/fragments at the beginning.
Made the XML Parser work with the DOM model (as opposed to the Event-based parsing that was used before)
Now the DOM XML Parser probably works good enough - and uses a single XML file for both the student and the intern situations.

Ok. So, now the persistent data storage based on XML files WORKS. :) I'm very happy about it. There are two types of reading and writing happening: One when the app starts for the first time and we take the data that we need from the big xml to create a user-data-file. The other is on the user-data-file, and happens every time that we read or change something in the steps.
Added the GROUP tag in the Xml data for Step, that characterizes a group of steps.
Fixed the issue with understanding the GROUPS of steps and unlocking them group by group.
Added icons to the sliding main menu.
Most of the changes concern the addition of the Card Info mechanism in the main page of the app, that show glanceable information about the status of the user.
Worked on the addition of a UI to add Notifications from any Step Info screen.
Bug fixes for showing the UI Cards in the Home Page, and changes to the Gradle settings for running the app on older devices (with less memory).
Settings Screen Listview implementation working.
Steps Adaptor callback not working currently.
Removed the try to make a Callback in steps, for updating their state. Still, the new GUI (with the Checkboxes) works great in Steps.
Things work. Started to implement the initial user input to seperate between Incoming and Outcoming students, and thus the Language used in the app (and some features).
Started playing with the localization issue.
Fixed the (stupid) problem with the Fragments in the User Input Activity.
Added working Add To Calendar Intent form the Step Information screen.
Checkbox in Steps List currently works correctly! :)
Fixed problems with the User Input layouts.
Worked on the layouts of the intro slider. Changed their structure. Not finished yet.
Now User Data is auto-uploaded to a specified Google Form.
Made Settings better - and moved them to the sliding menu. Also, worked on the Cards UI system.
Improved the Card UI.
Started working on perfecting the intro-Slider's ui.
Created a custom theme with white text for Toolbars.
Made the Xml Data Package contain and work with Incoming Erasmus Applicants also.
Rolled back to no Orientation. Will fix it later.
Worked on the layout of the input slider.
Worked on the layouts of users's data input.
Everything works right here.
Implemented the distinction between the two types of applicants (incoming and outgoing) as two seperate XML files, one for each, with a subsequent distinction between studying and interning.

MESSAGE.value: Added icons to the sliding main menu.
Most of the changes concern the addition of the Card Info mechanism in the main page of the app, that show glanceable information about the status of the user.
Worked on the addition of a UI to add Notifications from any Step Info screen.
Bug fixes for showing the UI Cards in the Home Page, and changes to the Gradle settings for running the app on older devices (with less memory).
Settings Screen Listview implementation working.
Steps Adaptor callback not working currently.
Removed the try to make a Callback in steps, for updating their state. Still, the new GUI (with the Checkboxes) works great in Steps.
Things work. Started to implement the initial user input to seperate between Incoming and Outcoming students, and thus the Language used in the app (and some features).
Started playing with the localization issue.
Fixed the (stupid) problem with the Fragments in the User Input Activity.
Added working Add To Calendar Intent form the Step Information screen.
Checkbox in Steps List currently works correctly! :)
Fixed problems with the User Input layouts.
Worked on the layouts of the intro slider. Changed their structure. Not finished yet.
Now User Data is auto-uploaded to a specified Google Form.
Made Settings better - and moved them to the sliding menu. Also, worked on the Cards UI system.
Improved the Card UI.
Started working on perfecting the intro-Slider's ui.
Created a custom theme with white text for Toolbars.
Made the Xml Data Package contain and work with Incoming Erasmus Applicants also.
Rolled back to no Orientation. Will fix it later.
Worked on the layout of the input slider.
Worked on the layouts of users's data input.
Everything works right here.
Implemented the distinction between the two types of applicants (incoming and outgoing) as two seperate XML files, one for each, with a subsequent distinction between studying and interning.
